subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Radamel Falcao scored twice, and Colombia defeated Bolivia, 2-0, in Santa Fe, Argentina, to become the first team to advance to the quarterfinals of the Copa América.
snippet: Radamel Falcao scored twice, and Colombia defeated Bolivia, 2-0, in Santa Fe, Argentina, to become the first team to advance to the quarterfinals of the Copa América.
